solution_line_template: For {num_days} days, Ivy consumes {water_per_day} x {num_days} = <<{water_per_day}*{num_days}={total_water_consumed}>>{total_water_consumed} liters of water.
So Ivy should buy {total_water_consumed}/{bottle_capacity} = <<{total_water_consumed}/{bottle_capacity}={num_bottles}>>{num_bottles} bottles of {bottle_capacity}-liter water.
